name: app
example_en: I downloaded a new app to help me learn English.
example_cn: 我下载了一个新的应用程序来帮助我学习英语。
memory_tips: 词源：'app' 是 'application' 的缩写，'application' 源自拉丁语 'applicatio'，意为'应用'或'使用'。联想记忆：可以将 'app' 想象成手机上的小图标，每个图标都代表一个不同的应用程序。图像记忆：想象一个智能手机屏幕上排列着各种应用程序的图标。

image_prompt.main_image: A smartphone screen displaying various app icons, such as a camera, a music note, and a book, with one icon highlighted to represent a new app being downloaded.
image_prompt.example_image: A person holding a smartphone, looking at the screen with a smile, indicating they have just downloaded a new app for learning English.

collocations: mobile app (手机应用); app store (应用商店); app development (应用开发)
